summary: Change to a Ghost when Ever You want and Cure when Don\'t want to be a Ghost
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=4]Description[/size][/b][/u]
This mod serves to add a New Spell to the game to Turn you Into a Ghost.

[b][u]New Spell[/u][/b]
[list=1][*]Ghost Form
[list][*]With this Spell You have the Ghost Effect Applied to the player.
[*]The Spell is Added as Soon as the Mod is Active
[*]After Every Hour Gametime that the Effect is Active it will randomly change.
[*]Recasting the Spell while active will Generate 1 of 5 random Ghost effects.
[/list][/list]
[b][u]Dispell[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]It is a Disease and Can be removed the same way as any other Disease.
[*]Sleep Will Remove it as Well
[/list]
[b][u][size=4]Compatibility[/size][/b][/u]
Should be compatible with anything. 

[b][u][size=4]Installation[/size][/b][/u]
[b][color=red][size=3]Uninstall any previous versions of this mod first[/size][/color][/b]
Simply use the Nexus Mod Manager or put the contents of this mod in your Skyrim\'s data folder.

[b][u][size=4]Uninstallation[/size][/b][/u]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager or Delete this mod\'s files from your Skyrim\'s data folder.

[b][u][size=4]Credits[/size][/b][/u]

[b][u][size=4]My Other Mods[/size][/b][/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19572]RustyTraders Harvest The Dead[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14467]RustyTraders Teleportation[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22984]RustyTraders Magic Arrows[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19798]RustyTraders Ghost Form[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28315]RustyTraders Auto Harvest[/url]
author: RustyTrader

files.name: Rustys_Ghost_Form_V1_1
files.changelogHtml:
5 Visual Effects Added
Remove Ghost form by Sleeping
Recast While Effect is Active Will randomly change to 1 of the 5 effects
While the Effect is Active will Auto Change Every hour game time
